channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Campbell’s Soup gets a Gen X makeover — 42-year-old fashion exec joins her family at $9 billion canned-soup-and-snacks giant
item.description: A luxury shoe designer has stepped into a board role previously held by her late mother.

item.description: Shigeru Ishiba of the long-governing Liberal Democratic Party could face calls to resign if his party fares poorly in Sunday’s Upper House elections.

item.title: Tear It Down, They Said. He Just Kept Building.
item.description: Defying demolition orders, a Chinese man turned his home into a rickety 11-story tower. Now tourists are coming.
